named-query.name: AbstractBuyBackAcces.getContractByNumber
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Contract c WHERE c.number =:number

named-query.name: AbstractBuyBackAcces.getContractByRvg
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Contract c WHERE c.contractRvg =:contractRvg

named-query.name: AbstractBuyBackAcces.getContractById
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Contract c WHERE c.id = :id
